articles.title: Bill Cosby found liable by jury in sexual abuse civil suit
articles.description: Judy Huth filed a civil lawsuit against Bill Cosby, alleging that Cosby molested her at the Playboy Mansion. Huth was awarded $500,000 in damages.
articles.content:
